description: a(n) = n times R(n) where R(n) (A004086) is the digit reversal of n.
comments: Every third term is divisible by 9, no other term is divisible by 3. - _Alonso del Arte_, Mar 04 2013
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, x=n; r=0; while (x>0, d=x-10*(x\10); x\=10; r=r*10 + d); write("b061205.txt", n, " ", n*r) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 18 2009(PARI) rev(k) = subst(Polrev(digits(k)), x, 10);a(n) = n*rev(n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 14 2015(Haskell)a061205 n = a004086 n * n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 10 2012, Apr 29 2011
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 21 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 04 2001
